names.english: clear the throat and calm the lungs decoction
names.commonEnglish: Clear the Throat and Calm the Lungs Decoction

actions: Drains Heat from the Lungs, stops cough and calms wheezing.
Expels Phlegm, descends Qi and expels Wind-Heat.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat, expels pus and opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
With Gan Cao and Huang Qin, disseminates Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, resolves toxicity, and expels pus for productive cough with hoarseness and pain and swelling of the throat due to Wind-Heat.
Clears Heat from the Lungs and Stomach and drains Fire.
With Zhe Bei Mu, for cough due to Lung Heat or Yin Deficiency with expectoration of thick, yellow sputum.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm and stops cough.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
With Zhi Mu and Sang Bai Pi, for acute and chronic Lung Heat cough.
With Zhi Zi, powerfully clears and drains lurking Heat from the Lungs with fever, fullness in the chest, cough with yellow sputum and epistaxis or hematemesis.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, Cools the Blood and relieves toxicity.
Clears the Lungs and transforms Hot Phlegm.
Disperses Wind and clears Heat
With Pang Da Hai, for hoarseness and loss of voice due to Lung Heat.
Clears and disseminates Lung Qi.
With Zhe Bei Mu, Jie Geng and Chan Tui, for hoarseness due to Lung Heat and cough due to Phlegm-Heat.
Moistens the Lungs, relieves cough and clears the voice.
With Pang Da Hai and Chan Tui, for a dry cough, hoarseness and pain and swelling of the throat.
Clears the Lungs
Transforms Phlegm
Clears Heat
Eases the throat

modifications.purpose: a very sore and congested throat
chronic hoarseness, loss of voice and laryngitis due to Qi, Blood and Phlegm Stagnation
